directions: Add onion, carrots, deer meat, pork, salt, sugar, and water to crock pot. Cook for 30 minutes.
Add cream of mushroom soup and cream of celery soup. Cook 3 1/2 to 4 hours.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of celery soup
title: Deer Soup with Cream of Mushroom and Celery
